#labels Phase-Deploy
{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE struts PUBLIC "-//Apache Software Foundation//DTD Struts Configuration 2.0//EN" "http://struts.apache.org/dtds/struts-2.0.dtd">
<struts>
	<constant name="struts.devMode" value="true" />
	
	<!-- Here is our main package which all the packages will extend. -->
	<package name="default" namespace="/jsp" extends="struts-default">
		<!-- Lets configure the Interceptors -->
		<interceptors>
			<interceptor name="applicationInterceptor" class="com.patni.utils.ApplicationInterceptor" />
			<interceptor name="userInterceptor" class="com.patni.utils.UserInterceptor" />
			<interceptor-stack name="applicationInterceptorStack">
				<interceptor-ref name="applicationInterceptor" />
				<interceptor-ref name="userInterceptor" />
				<interceptor-ref name="defaultStack" />
			</interceptor-stack>
		</interceptors>
		
		<!-- Lets configure the Default Interceptor Stack -->
		<default-interceptor-ref name="applicationInterceptorStack" />

		<!-- Defining the Global Result Pages -->
		<global-results>
			<result name="login" type="redirect">/jsp/login.jsp</result>
			<result name="error" type="redirect">/jsp/error.jsp</result>
		</global-results>
		
		<!-- To enable the users to login to the System -->
		<action name="LoginAction" class="com.patni.action.LoginAction">
			<interceptor-ref name="applicationInterceptor" />
			<interceptor-ref name="defaultStack" />
			<result>/jsp/homepage.jsp</result>
		</action>
		
		<!-- Log the user out of the System -->
		<action name="LogoutAction" class="com.patni.action.LogOutAction">
		</action>
		
		<!-- Display the Store Details -->
		<action name="DisplayStore" class="com.patni.action.DisplayStoreAction">
			<result name="input">/jsp/homepage.jsp</result>
			<result>/jsp/store.jsp</result>
		</action>
		
		<!-- Get the Opening Times for the Store -->
		<action name="OpenStoreDetailsAction" class="com.patni.action.OpenStoreDetailsAction">
			<result>/jsp/store.jsp</result>
		</action>
		
		<!-- Display the FDI History for the Store -->
		<action name="FdiAction" class="com.patni.action.FdiAction">
			<result>/jsp/fdi_history.jsp</result>
		</action>
		
		<!-- Display the Volume Details for the Store -->
		<action name="VolumeAction" class="com.patni.action.VolumeAction">
			<result>/jsp/volume.jsp</result>
		</action>
		
		<!-- Display the Address Details for the Store -->
		<action name="AddressAction" class="com.patni.action.AddressAction">
			<result>/jsp/address.jsp</result>
		</action>
		
		<!-- Display the Call Activities for the Store -->
		<action name="DisplayCalls" class="com.patni.action.DisplayCalls">
			<result>/jsp/display_calls.jsp</result>
		</action>
		
		<!-- Display the Comments for the Store -->
		<action name="CommentAction" class="com.patni.action.CommentAction">
			<result>/jsp/comments.jsp</result>
		</action>
		
		<action name="TestAction" class="com.patni.action.TestAction">
			<result>/jsp/login.jsp</result>
		</action>
		
		<!-- Display the Contact details for the Store -->
		<action name="DisplayContact" class="com.patni.action.DisplayContactsAction">
			<result>/jsp/display_contacts.jsp</result>
		</action>
		
		<!-- Display the Equipment details for the Store -->
		<action name="EquipmentAction" class="com.patni.action.EquipmentAction">
			<result>/jsp/equipment.jsp</result>
		</action>
		
		<!-- Display the Program Details for the Store -->
		<action name="ProgramAction" class="com.patni.action.ProgramAction">
			<result>/jsp/program.jsp</result>
		</action>
		 
		<!-- Add a new Comment for the Store -->	
		<action name="AddCommentAction" class="com.patni.action.AddCommentAction">
			<result>/jsp/closetab.jsp</result>
		</action>
		
		<!-- Add a new Contact for the Store -->
		<action name="AddContactAction" class="com.patni.action.AddContactAction">
			<result>/jsp/closetab.jsp</result>
		</action>
		
		<!-- Load the details in the edit form -->
		<action name="EditStoreAction" class="com.patni.action.EditStoreAction">
			<result>/jsp/editstore.jsp</result>
		</action>
		
		<!-- Save the Store details -->
		<action name="SaveStoreAction" class="com.patni.action.SaveStoreAction">
			<result type="redirectAction">DisplayStore</result>
		</action>

	</package>
</struts>
}}}
